title: Scepter's End
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship overcomes darkness and destroys the Scepter of Command
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship learns about the dangers of Vetta and receives guidance and letters of introduction from the priestess Iskra in Tollen.
They gather information from Umli the Stoneborn and Caelynn the Seer on how to destroy powerful artifacts and about the Elemental Plane of Fire.
Traveling to Antaka, they consult Skalme about the Scepter of Command, learning it can only be destroyed in sacred waters during a full moon.
In Pyhlla, they uncover the history of Urgall the Black's attack on Vetta and receive advice from the sole survivor, Tulvak.
After battling through the island's dangers, including Urgall and a powerful demon, the party cleanses the corrupted sacred waters of Kaikkea.
The scepter soaks in the sacred waters for 24 hours before being shattered at dawn by Kenzo, extinguishing the bound devil's soul.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship defeats Urgall the Black and a demonic entity in Vetta, ultimately destroying the cursed Scepter of Command.
